error_details.explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '*' but used '+' instead.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 76
She will be driving 330 miles for her trip because 2 x 165 = <<2*165=330>>330
They will need 11 gallons of gas because 330 / 30 =<<330/30=11>>11
The gas will cost $14 because 11 + 3 = <<11+3=14>>14
Her total cost is $104 because 10 + 55 + 25 + 14 = <<10+55+25+14=104>>104
She needs to save $76 more because 104 - 28 = <<104-28=76>>76
